name: MIPT-MIPS
tagline: Functional and performance simulators for MIPS-based microprocessor
body:
This project is a part of [Intel lab's](http://ilab.fizteh.ru) activity at [Moscow Institute of Physics and Technology](http://phystech.edu/) (MIPT). The project is being developed by a group of students under the guidance of Intel employees. The aim of the project is to teach the students the computer architecture through development of a microprocessor implementing the [MIPS](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/MIPS32) instruction set in both functional and performance simulators. More information about MIPT Intel lab history and goals is available on [website](http://mipt.ru/drec/about/ilab/about.php) (in Russian). ## Lectures on Computer Architecture Here you may find lectures on the computer architecture, simulation practicums and tests of 2015/2016 year: w | Date | Event | Homework :-: | :--: | ------------------------------ | -------------------------- 1 | 19 Sep | **L1: Project intro**
[Rus text, No audio](https://github.com/MIPT-ILab/mipt-mips/blob/master/2015/Lecture_1__19_Sep__Project_Introduction__Rus_text__No_audio.pptx?raw=true)
[Rus text, Rus audio](https://github.com/MIPT-ILab/mipt-mips/blob/master/2015/Lecture_1__19_Sep__Project_Introduction__Rus_text__Rus_audio.pptx?raw=true) | 2 | 26 Sep | **P1: Basics of Simulator Development**
[Eng text, No audio](https://github.com/MIPT-ILab/mipt-mips/blob/master/2015/Practice_1__26_Sep__Basics_of_Simulator_Development__Eng_text__No_audio.pptx?raw=true) | Commit your name into members.txt file. Get help in our [Git & GitHub cheat sheet](https://github.com/MIPT-ILab/mipt-mips-2015/wiki/Git-&-GitHub-cheat-sheet) | 3 | 03 Oct | **L2: Layers of Computer Science, ISA and uArch**
[Eng text, No audio](https://github.com/MIPT-ILab/mipt-mips/blob/master/2015/Lecture_2__20_Sep__Layers_of_Computer_Science__ISA_and_uArch___Eng_text__No_audio.pptx?raw=true) | Start [1st assignment](https://github.com/MIPT-ILab/mipt-mips-2015/wiki/Assignment-1) | 4 | 10 Oct | **L3: Boolean Algebra. Combinational Circuits** | | 5 | 17 Oct | **_Upcoming event_** | Deadline for the 1st assignment | 6 | 24 Oct | **_Upcoming event_** | Get ready for upcoming test | 7 | 31 Oct | **Test 1:**
Review **L2−L5** material
(excluding semiconductors, n/p-doping and transistor structure)
Review 1st and 2nd chapters of Schildt C++ manual
| | Instructions to use downloaded material can be found on [wiki page](https://github.com/MIPT-ILab/mipt-mips/wiki/LecturesInstructions). Lectures of previous years archive: [2014](https://github.com/MIPT-ILab/mipt-mips/wiki/Lectures2014), [2013](https://github.com/MIPT-ILab/mipt-mips/wiki/Lectures2013), [2012](https://github.com/MIPT-ILab/mipt-mips/wiki/Lectures2012). ## Assignments repo In our [production repo](https://github.com/MIPT-ILab/mipt-mips-2015) you may find C++ sources required to complete this year course assignments — step-by-step implementation of MIPS simulator. That repo has a lot of useful [Wiki manuals](https://github.com/MIPT-ILab/mipt-mips-2015/wiki) about Git, MIPS, C++, Make utilites and so on. ## About us The project has been started in 2009 year as part of Intel lab's acivity in MIPT. Since 2015, it is mentored by [Pavel Kryukov](https://github.com/pavelkryukov) and [Igor Smirnov](https://github.com/igorsmir-ilab). For more information, check [this wiki page](https://github.com/MIPT-ILab/mipt-mips-2015/wiki/AboutUs) and [Intel lab's site](http://ilab.fizteh.ru)
